hero.title: About The White Horse Waterbeach
hero.subtitle: England's largest thatched pub, relaunched February 2025 with Himalayan hospitality and village spirit.

story.title: Our Story
story.introduction: Opposite Waterbeach village green, The White Horse has anchored the community since its 1890 coaching inn days. Saved from redevelopment and revived by Lapen Inns on 6 February 2025, we now pair authentic Nepalese cooking with the warmth of a classic British pub.

timeline.title: Coaching Inn Origins
timeline.description: Built for boat crews and railway travellers, the thatched White Horse quickly became Waterbeach's social hub.

timeline.title: Community Preservation
timeline.description: Locals rallied to protect the pub from redevelopment, restoring its garden cabins, terrace and historic frontage.

timeline.title: Lapen Inns Relaunch
timeline.description: On 6 February 2025 the Gautam family reopened the doors, introducing a Nepalese kitchen while keeping cask ales, Sky Sports and village events alive.

cta.title: Plan Your Visit
cta.description: Call or email to reserve a table, enquire about events or arrange takeaway from Waterbeach's revived thatched pub.
